description: Try our easy to follow African Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Sesame free,Mushroom,Zucchini,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Peanut free
name: African Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large green capsicum, deseeded (cut into 3cm pieces)
1 large red capsicum, deseeded (cut into 3cm pieces)

recipeInstructions.text: Place lamb into a bowl. Roughly chop 1 onion and process with garlic, ginger, curry powder, jam, vinegar and vegetable oil in a small food processor until almost smooth. Add marinade to lamb and completely coat. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 2 hours or overnight.
Cut remaining onions into 3cm pieces. Thread lamb and vegetables onto 10 metal skewers. Transfer leftover marinade to a small pan. Bring to the boil over high heat and cook for 2 minutes.
To make the tomato salad, combine all ingredients in a bowl.

Preheat a barbecue or grill pan over mediumhigh heat. Spray skewers with oil and cook on grill for 8 minutes, turning, or until well browned and cooked through. Serve skewers with salad, chapatis and sauce.
